Uses of Package
eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.comm

  • Packages that use eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.comm 
    Package Description
    eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine
    The Flow Engine main classes, the Flow Engine Compiler and the Flow Engine Configuration classes.
    eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.impl
    Default implementations of the Flow Engine API with local and remote options.
    eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.comm
    Communication classes through various means: JDBC, JMS, SOAP, FTP, HTTP, etc.
  • Classes in eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.comm used by eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine 
    Class and Description
    JDBCConnection
    Wraps a java.sql.Connection and provides some useful methods.
  • Classes in eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.comm used by eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.api.impl 
    Class and Description
    JDBCConnection
    Wraps a java.sql.Connection and provides some useful methods.
  • Classes in eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.comm used by eu.advance.logistics.flow.engine.comm 
    Class and Description
    EmailConnection
    Represents the available functions of an email connection.
    FileAccess
    The functions to access files relative to a base directory.
    FileChangeInfo
    Record to store a FileInfo and a change reason.
    FileChangeType
    Enumeration of file change types.
    FileInfo
    Record class representing a file or directory on a local or remote (s)FTP(s) site.
    FTPConnection
    Represents an FTP(s) or an SFTP connection with standard file and directory functions.
    JDBCConnection
    Wraps a java.sql.Connection and provides some useful methods.
    JMSConnection
    An immutable class that wraps the various objects of a JMS based connection: the context, connection, session, queue, etc.
    LocalConnection
    Class representing the ability to load, save and list files from local directory.
    SOAPConnection
    Represents a SOAP connection.
    WebConnection
    Represents the functions of a HTTP(s) connection.
